definition: The term refers to the complete visual representation or overall impression of something, typically used to describe the comprehensive view or image formed by combining various elements or aspects. It is commonly employed in contexts related to art, design, photography, or any situation where the entirety of a visual composition is being discussed.

examples.german: Das Gesamtbild des Projekts ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The overall picture of the project is impressive.

examples.german: Das Gesamtbild der Stadt hat sich in den letzten Jahren stark verändert.
examples.english: The overall image of the city has changed significantly in recent years.

examples.german: Um das Gesamtbild zu verstehen, müssen alle Details berücksichtigt werden.
examples.english: To understand the overall picture, all details must be taken into account.

examples.german: Das Gesamtbild der Veranstaltung war sehr ansprechend.
examples.english: The overall impression of the event was very appealing.

examples.german: Das Gesamtbild der Landschaft ist atemberaubend schön.
examples.english: The overall view of the landscape is breathtakingly beautiful.
